name: Idlelands
tagline: An idling game set in the realm of IRC. It has a modular backend that can be added to any existing frontend (if the frontend uses node).
body:
### Idle Lands
Idle Lands is an idling game that takes a couple twists on the original IdleRPG formula. The primary difference is the amount and breadth of events and items that we support and the comical situations that can arise. The second difference is the combat system. 

### Want to join?

We're in a couple of irc networks, currently we're in irc.snoonet.org, irc.esper.net, irc.freenode.net -- the channel is #idlebot. You can find us in irc.esper.net##idlebot if you want to chat with the devs.

### Differences

Here are a few sample events:
```
<@IdleMaster> Grooglar stumbled across a wishing well, threw spined indigo potato sack in, and it got enchanted! [dex = 10 | +0 -> +1]

<@IdleMaster> Judge was given a airbrushed free barette by a shady magician. [21 -> 67 | +46]

<@IdleMaster> Pakalu Papito practices in cake decoration, and succeeds in proportions greater than cheesecake! Pakalu Papito won a cake-decorating contest with his cake, earning him 100xp as a reward! [100xp, ~0.344%]
```

Here is an example of combat:
```
<@IdleMaster> A battle is raging...
<@IdleMaster> A new combat round has started. Current status: Treglar [ HP 250/250 MP 517/517 ], ConanTheLibrarian [ HP 620/620 MP 195/195 ], MichealRein [ HP 59/59 MP 13/13 ], g3istbot [ HP 25/25 MP 11/11 ], foosky [ HP 0/-25 MP 0/-9 ]
<@IdleMaster> Treglar is attacking ConanTheLibrarian, and hit with his confused rod for 66 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> ConanTheLibrarian is attacking MichealRein, and hit with his replica dagger for 69 HP damage -- a fatal blow!
<@IdleMaster> g3istbot is attacking Treglar, and hit with his Empty and Broken Ale Bottle for 9 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> A new combat round has started. Current status: Treglar [ HP 241/250 MP 517/517 ], ConanTheLibrarian [ HP 554/620 MP 195/195 ], MichealRein [ HP 0/59 MP 13/13 ], g3istbot [ HP 25/25 MP 11/11 ], foosky [ HP 0/-25 MP 0/-9 ]
<@IdleMaster> Treglar infused Treglar with boar strength!
<@IdleMaster> ConanTheLibrarian is attacking Treglar, and hit with his replica dagger for 135 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> g3istbot is attacking Treglar, and hit with his Empty and Broken Ale Bottle for 9 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> A new combat round has started. Current status: Treglar [ HP 97/250 MP 217/517 ], ConanTheLibrarian [ HP 554/620 MP 195/195 ], MichealRein [ HP 0/59 MP 13/13 ], g3istbot [ HP 25/25 MP 11/11 ], foosky [ HP 0/-25 MP 0/-9 ]
<@IdleMaster> Treglar cast cure at MichealRein and healed 11 HP!
<@IdleMaster> ConanTheLibrarian is attacking MichealRein, and hit with his replica dagger for 76 HP damage -- a fatal blow!
<@IdleMaster> g3istbot is attacking Treglar, and hit with his Empty and Broken Ale Bottle for 2 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> A new combat round has started. Current status: Treglar [ HP 95/250 MP 167/517 ], ConanTheLibrarian [ HP 554/620 MP 195/195 ], MichealRein [ HP 0/59 MP 13/13 ], g3istbot [ HP 25/25 MP 11/11 ], foosky [ HP 0/-25 MP 0/-9 ]
<@IdleMaster> Treglar is attacking ConanTheLibrarian, and hit with his confused rod for 142 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> ConanTheLibrarian is attacking Treglar, and hit with his replica dagger for 90 HP damage!
<@IdleMaster> g3istbot is attacking Treglar, and hit with his Empty and Broken Ale Bottle for 8 HP damage -- a fatal blow!
<@IdleMaster> The battle was won by Band of Bros.
<@IdleMaster> g3istbot has attained level 2!
<@IdleMaster> ConanTheLibrarian gained 1080xp, g3istbot gained 1080xp and foosky gained 1080xp!
<@IdleMaster> Treglar lost 85xp and MichealRein lost 53xp!
```
